comment:
She shouldn't have started the lawsuits with that very first arbitration claim that the Judge denied!  It is illegal to allow "anonymous donors" (Elon Musk) to attempt to fulfill Ms. Heard's donation contract.  Ms. Heard was granted a *TEMPORARY restraining order* which requires no evidence or notification.  The hearing was to be held in two weeks--but when the evidence for Mr. Depp was presented against Ms. Heard's evidence, *she dropped her allegations* and Superior Court Judge Carl H. Moor *DISMISSED Ms. Heard's case WITH PREJUDICE* which means that he found her case to be "egregiously flawed and without merit" and she can NEVER bring those charges against Mr. Depp in the future.

When Ms. Heard made her public statement and issued press releases that she was donating her entire settlement to charity, as quoted from "Inside Philanthropy: When Donors Back Out" "A pledge to donate is not a promise, it is a contract.  It's enforceability is governed by Contract Law and California State Law.  Once pledged in a public statement or press release, it can be held as binding."  As to the Court Documents, Ms. Heard has donated $0.00 herself to the Los Angeles Children's Hospital, Mr. Depp donated her first installment of $100,000 directly to the Hospital, which she has subsequently attempted to have them return to her, and the ACLU refuses to release how much she paid them for her ambassadorship... I mean donated (but you would *think* that they would be broadcasting it from the rooftops...unless , of course, she hasn't donated to them.) Ms. Heard *committed perjury* in the U.K. Trial, when she testified that she had given all of her divorce settlement to charity -- but apparently in the U.K. you can commit multiple perjury and it doesn't affect your credibility... but it affects your credibility in the U.S., and *definitely* in Virginia!

comment:
2017 Amber Heard proclaims to every news outlet in the world: ‚Äú7 million dollars in total WAS donated to... ACLU and CHLA‚Äù. 

2018: Johnny Depp paid final portion of 7 million settlement. 
2018: Amber wrote the op-ed in December.
2019: CHLA Mailed her a letter and asked when they would be getting the 3.5 million dollar donation. Crickets. 
2019: Depp sued Amber Heard for defamation in March.
2020: Amber Heard‚Äôs attorney, Elaine Bredehoft, states in legal filing that Amber meant she would eventually over her lifetime donate 7 million. She claims Amber used the money for legal fees. How did she know a year before being sued, that she would be sued?!

Amber Heard LIED!  She also lied on the stand in the UK trial therefore, committing perjury and should be charged and jailed.

I find it pathetic that ppl defend him just bc he is their favorite actor. I see this lawsuit as an attempt (as well as the other failed attempts to prove her wrong) as terrorism against a woman who is trying to get out of a toxic/narcissistic marriage and ppl are applauding him for his continuous harassment üòí

Johny is trying to destroy her in any way possible, even when most of his lawsuit against her has been proven wrong in a legitimate court of law. Since he have fail all attempts, he is now using this argument to somewhat look good in the public eye. Miss amber already told that she was not able to donate all the money bc his continuos lawsuit affected her ability to work and thus she is using the money to defend herself, which is something fair.
